long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Website Aura brings professional color analysis to your browser. This powerful Chrome extension deconstructs web designs into their core color patterns, revealing the psychological impact and mood behind every palette. Perfect for creators who see colors as a language of design.

‚ú® WHAT IT DOES

Instantly analyzes any website's color palette
Reveals the emotional mood of the design
Identifies professional color schemes
Shows color relationships and harmony
Extracts top 5 most used colors

üöÄ KEY FEATURES

Real-time color mood detection
Professional design analysis
Color scheme identification
Emotional impact assessment
Visual hierarchy analysis

üéØ DESIGN MOODS
Six distinct website moods:

Professional: Balanced and trustworthy corporate designs
Creative: Unique and expressive artistic approaches
Minimalist: Clean and focused experiences
Confident: Strong and impactful statements
Elegant: Sophisticated and refined aesthetics
Practical: Functional and straightforward layouts

üåà COLOR SCHEMES
Color relationships we analyze:

Monochromatic: Single-hue professional harmony
Analogous: Neighboring colors for cohesion
Complementary: Opposing colors for impact
Practical: Balanced everyday functionality
Vibrant: High-energy color combinations

üîí PRIVACY FIRST
Website Aura operates entirely within your browser, analyzing colors in real-time without storing or transmitting any data. No servers, no tracking, no data collection - just pure color magic happening right on your device. Your browsing remains private and secure.
üë• PERFECT FOR

UI/UX Designers seeking color inspiration

Digital Artists exploring color psychology
Brand Managers ensuring visual consistency
Design Students learning color theory
Anyone curious about web design moods

üí° HOW TO USE
Simply click the extension icon on any website to instantly see its color mood analysis. No configuration needed - just install and explore!
